title: Mozart vs Skrillex. Epic Rap Battles of History Season 2.
description: Season 3 CD with 6 unreleased tracks! New shirts too! PRE-ORDER HERE ►http://shop.erb.fm/?s=robotballs◄ DOWNLOAD This Song: ► http://bit.ly/11HLeiz ◄ Tweet this Vid-ee-oh! http://clicktotweet.com/Dc27C ERB Merch: http://bit.ly/ERBSHOP Check out the new ERB App...it's FREE! iPhone - http://bit.ly/16mGnFo iPad - http://bit.ly/YoskYG Android - http://bit.ly/Zg86CK Help us translate this battle! ►http://erb.fm/TranslateMozart◄ Watch this in your language! ► http://erb.fm/a0l ◄ http://instagram.com/erb | http://facebook.com/erb http://twitter.com/ERBofHistory | http://google.com/+ERB http://erb.tumblr.com | http://soundcloud.com/erb http://epicrapbattlesofhistory.com Hi. My name is Nice Peter, and this is EpicLLOYD, and this is the Epic Rap Battles of History, Season 2. As always, these videos could not be possible without your suggestions, your subscription, and the help of a lot of awesome people. Special thanks to our homies at Maker Studios, they helped us create the rap battles, and they continue to support us with everything we need to keep making them. ▼ CAST ▼ Mozart: Nice Peter http://www.youtube.com/NicePeter http://facebook.com/NicePeter http://twitter.com/NicePeter | http://instagram.com/nicepeter Skrillex: EpicLLOYD http://www.youtube.com/EpicLLOYD http://www.facebook.com/epiclloyd https://twitter.com/theEpicLloyd | http://instagram.com/theepiclloyd ▼ CREW ▼ Executive Producers: Peter Shukoff & Lloyd Ahlquist Written by: NicePeter, EpicLLOYD, Dante Cimadamore, Zach Sherwin and Mike Betette Beat Produced by: Jessie Cale download instrumental here: http://bit.ly/ZhaG9I Song Produced by: Nice Peter and Choco Mixed by: Choco and Nice Peter http://www.1200warriors.com Directed by Dave McCary http://www.youtube.com/David CREW Compositing and Background Design by Andrew Sherman Edited by Dave McCary, Andrew Sherman and Nice Peter Assistant Editor: Ryan Moulton Assistant Editor: Marc Chester Director of Photography: Jon Na Gaffer: Arthur Hong Music Supervisor and Playback: Dante Cimadamore Costume Designer: Sulai Lopez Art Consultant: Mary Gutfleisch Makeup and Hair: Ashlyn Melancon Script Supervisor and Production Assistant: Marc Chester Production Coordinator: Atul Singh Production Assistants: Jose Mendoza, Trent Turner and Shaun Lewin Produced by Michelle Maloney for Maker Studios, Los Angeles, CA Okay, I think that's it. Thanks again and see you soon, - nice peter & epiclloyd
